edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce
Interface SSListener

public interface SSListener

Callback interface for interacting with a StateServer, which keeps track of what is known about the environment and your position in it.

Author:
Nisarg

Method Summary
 void newTaskUpdate(Annotation task)
          Called whenever a new task has been assigned to this agent
 void SSUpdate(StateServer s)
          Called whenever there is a change in the environment, like a new annotation.
 

Method Detail

SSUpdate

void SSUpdate(StateServer s)
Called whenever there is a change in the environment, like a new annotation.

Parameters:
s - The StateServer the change is associated with.

newTaskUpdate

void newTaskUpdate(Annotation task)
Called whenever a new task has been assigned to this agent
